College_Summary: Barkatullah University, formerly known as Bhopal University, was renamed Barkatullah Vishwavidyalaya in 1988 to honor the renowned independence warrior Professor Barkatullah, a native of Bhopal. The university was accreditated "B” grade by NAAC. The university offers courses in the faculties of the arts, social sciences, sciences, life sciences, engineering, law, commerce, education, physical education, technology, home science, and management through its affiliated colleges and university teaching departments. The university has eight districts within its purview. The University also imparts its several programs through distance mode. Check Barkatullah University Distance Education

The Indira Gandhi National Tribal University, Anuppur, Madhya Pradesh has been established by an Act of the Parliament of India. It came to existence by the Indira Gandhi National Tribal University Act, 2007 and came into action in July 2008. It is a UGC-recognized university and also accredited by NAAC with grade 'B'.

Rajmata Vijaya Raje Scindia Krishi Vishwavidyalaya has been ranked 7th in ICAR ranking and 26th in India Today among Indian Universities. The institution offers courses at Bachelors, Masters, and Doctoral research levels. Admission is provided through the VYAPAM and ICAR entrance examinations. College_Summary: The Atal Bihari Vajpayee Hindi Vishwavidyalaya is a State University in Madhya Pradesh, established in 2011. The university offers courses in different modes of study such as regular, correspondence, training, and certification. The courses offered include MBA, M.Sc in 8 specializations, MA in 15 specializations, B.Sc in 12 specializations, 12 Post Graduate Diplomas, BA in 8 specializations, BFA, BBA, BCA, and many more. Admissions to all courses are merit-based.

University Institute of Technology (UIT-RGPV) was set up in the year of 1986 by the Madhya Pradesh Government. It is an autonomous institute and accredited with grade ‘A’ by NAAC. The institute is affiliated to Rajiv Gandhi Proudyogiki Vishwavidyalaya & is approved by the AICTE. It offers B.E at the UG level & ME, MCA, M.Sc. at the PG level. The Institute of Engineering & Technology (IET), is an engineering college of Devi Ahilya Vishwavidyalaya, Indore. It was founded as an autonomous institute in 1996. It is an approved Institution by All India Council for Technical Education (AICTE), New Delhi, Government of Madhya Pradesh and University Grants Commission (UGC). IET was started with a total intake of 90 students in three branches of Bachelor of Engineering (BE) but now it offers an undergraduate program in six disciplines with a total intake of 540 and Postgraduate programs in engineering and science too.

SAGE University, Bhopal is a leading institute in the educational hub Bhopal. College_Summary: IIIT Bhopal is one of the newest IIITs, established in 2017. The institute is located in Bhopal and the campus size is nearly of 60-acres of land. IIIT Bhopal offers B.Tech as its flagship program under 3 different specialisations. JEE Mains score determines the admission to IIIT Bhopal’s BTech program. On qualifying for the JEE Mains exam, candidates are allotted seats by the JoSAA and CSAB counselling. The general category JEE Main Cutoff for CSE at IIIT Bhopal ranges from 11845-21346 rank. IIIT Bhopal placements 2023 report has been published. A total of 134 students were placed during the IIIT Bhopal placements 2023 with the highest and average packages of INR 80 LPA and INR 21.94 LPA respectively. Also, the second-highest package received by IIIT Bhopal was INR 60 LPA. The top employers at IIIT Bhopal were Citibank, Adobe, Amazon, Wipro, Samsung, LTI, GEP, FIS, Infosys, and Optum.

SAGE University, Indore is a top-tier private university in India which is ranked 4th in Central India, 65th in India by The Times of India 2020 Ranking. It is the number 1 emerging university by Outlook 2020. SAGE University has received approval from the UGC, AICTE, BCI, COA, PCI and achieved Grade A+ by NAAC. The university offers a wide range of courses at UG, PG and PhD level in almost all disciplines such as Engineering, Commerce, Management, Pharmacy, Science, Humanities, Design etc. Some of its top courses are BTech, MBA, BBA, BDes, PhD etc. Know More: SAGE University Indore Courses & Fees

A total of 18 students were selected by Ceasefire Industries Ltd. at a package of INR 4.5 LPA and 6 students were selected by Visa Steels Ltd. at a package of INR 5.8 LPA. Some of the top recruiters of Wipro, BYJU’s, Infosys, Ceasefire Industries Ltd., Visa Steels Ltd., CapitalVia, Axis Bank, Eastern Software Systems, FedEx and many more.

Jabalpur Engineering College, Jabalpur was established in July 1947. The Institute is approved by AICTE and is affiliated to Rajiv Gandhi Proudyogiki Vishwavidyalya. It is Second Engineering College in India and is the premier institution of engineering in Central India.

Swami Vivekananda University is a private university, located at Sagar in Madhya Pradesh. Established in 1994, SVU is UGC and AICTE-approved for its excellent infrastructure and the quality of education. SVU is the home for various undergraduate and postgraduate courses across a massive 12-acre campus.

Acropolis group of institutions was established in the year 2005 in Madhya Pradesh, Indore. it is approved by AICTE. It offers courses in multiple fields and distinct specialisations such as B.Tech, B.Sc, BA, BBA, B.Pharm, BA, B.Com, M.Pharm, D.Pharm, M.Sc, M.Tech, M.Com and diploma courses among others.

Ujjain Engineering College is a public college that promotes technical education in the state with three core branches of engineering Civil, Mechanical, & Electrical. The institute further launched new branches of engineering like Electronics and Civil in 1985 and 1986. Computer Science Engineering was also introduced in the session 2001-2002. It received recognition from the AICTE and received a declaration as an autonomous engineering college by the State Government. Ujjain Engineering College offers undergraduate, postgraduate, Ph.D., and part-time degree programs in different branches of Engineering and Science. There are a total of eight departments in the institute offering quality and professional education to the students.

LNCT University (LNCTU), Bhopal is a private university established in 2015 and approved by UGC, AICTE, MCI, BCI and ICAR. The university offers various undergraduate, postgraduate and doctoral programs in disciplines of Engineering, Management, Pharmacy, Medical, Ayurveda, Agriculture science, Journalism & Mass Communication, Sports, Paramedical, Law and other recurring professional studies.

Courses_Details.Course Name: Bachelor of Business Administration + Bachelor of Laws [BBALLB]

College_Summary: Pandit SN Shukla University (PTSNS University), established in 1956 is declared a full fledged university in 2016. It is located in Shahdol district of Madhya Pradesh. The university offers courses for graduation, post-graduation, PhD with the experienced faculty members. It offers 37 courses across 5 streams. The NIRF Ranking of the university is 101-105 ( for general- india) and for pharmacy-india, the ranking is 48. The total strength of the university is 5385 and for the purpose of growth, the university is going to open a  new campus at Navalpur in Shahdol district.

College_Name: BM College of Management and Research - [BMCMR], Indore
College_Summary: The BM College of Management and Research, Indore is trying to nurture future managers in various fields of work for building a stronger India with their skills and knowledge. The institute believes in the talent and the potential of the youth and that after realizing their dreams and capabilities they can lead the world without any doubts..

Saifia College of Education was established in 1958. The college offers undergraduate and postgraduate courses in different subjects. The mission of the college is run under Saifia Education Society as a degree College with a primary objective of Imparting education, Training and Research to the Minority Community. The College has the Honour of producing more than 200 PhDs amongst thousands and thousands of graduates, Post- graduates, Research Scholars and teachers in the field of Science, Arts, Commerce, Education and Law.

Shri Govindram Seksaria Institute of Technology and Science (SGSITS) is a government-aided autonomous institute established in 1952 in Indore, Madhya Pradesh. SGSITS is approved by UGC and AICTE. The institute has been granted autonomous status in 1989. SGSITS Indore is affiliated with the Rajiv Gandhi Prodyogiki Vishwavidhyalaya (University of Technology of M.P.) Bhopal. Shri Govindram Seksaria Institute of Technology and Science offers 10 UG, 25 PG and numerous Ph.D. courses in the fields of Engineering, Technology, Applied Sciences, Computer Applications, Management, Humanities, Social Sciences, and Pharmacy. SGSITS campus is spread over an area of 35 acres. Admission to SGSITS Indore is based on merit in the National Level Examinations like JEE Mains, GATE, GPAT, etc. The institute has a Training and Placement Cell which offers placement assistance to students. As per the recent placement report, the highest package of SGSITS is INR 44.5 LPA. The college offers various scholarships for meritorious students. SGSITS Indore has 4 Boys' Hostels and 2 Girls' Hostels.

College_Name: Lakshmi Narain College of Technology - [LNCT], Jabalpur
College_Summary: Lakshmi Narain College of Technology (LNCT), Jabalpur is a private college established in 2008 under the aegis of H. K. Kalchuri Education Society. The college is affiliated to RGPV, RDVV and approved by AICTE. The college offers various undergraduate, postgraduate and diploma courses in the discipline of Engineering & Management.

College_Summary: Established in 1993, Lakshmi Narain College of Technology (LNCT), Bhopal is premier institute in MP. The college offers 13 undergraduate and 9 postgraduate programs, all offered in a full-time mode in the field of Engineering, Business and Management Studies, IT, and software.

Technocrats Institute of Technology, Bhopal was established in 1999 by TIT Group of Institutions under the guidance of “Chandra Vadani Mahila Shiksha Samiti”. The college is affiliated to Rajiv Gandhi Technical University. It is approved by All India Council for Technical Education (A.I.C.T.E) and Government of Madhya Pradesh. It is one of the premier technical institutes that provides best quality education in the field of Engineering and Technology. The college offers courses in Management and engineering fields. The college has separate accommodation for girls and boys with furnished rooms and uninterrupted power supply. There is a special vehicle available 24X7 at the hostel premises.

College_Name: Pioneer Institute of Professional Studies - [PIPS], Indore
Renaissance College of Commerce & Management - [RCCM], Indore
College_Summary: Renaissance College of Commerce & Management (RCCM) is a private institute that was established in 2006. The institute offers undergraduate degree courses – BBA, BA (Honours), B.Com, B.Com (Hons) in the field of Commerce, Management and Mass Communication. The admission to these courses is based on merit. The application process is online.

Mahakal Institute of Technology (MIT) is a private engineering institute established in the year 2001 at Ujjain, Madhya. It is affiliated to Rajiv Gandhi Proudyogiki Vishwavidyalaya and has been approved by AICTE. The institute offers B.Tech, ME, M.Tech, Diploma in engineering programs under highly qualified and technically experienced faculty members. More than 100 reputed organizations participate in the campus drive every year.

College_Summary: Oriental Institute of Science & Technology (OIST), Jabalpur was founded in the year 2008. It is affiliated to Rajiv Gandhi Proudyogiki Vishwavidyalaya and has been approved by NBA and AICTE. Presently, it is running B. Tech and diploma courses in various specializations and also an MBA program. The institute has the top-class infrastructure and is famous for its outstanding campus placement record.

College_Name: Sagar Institute of Science and Technology
College_Summary: Sagar Institute of Science and Technology (SISTEC), Bhopal one of the best engineering colleges in MP, established in 2007. SISTec since its inception has featured in the list of top-ranked engineering colleges in India. The institute offers undergraduate and postgraduate programs in the discipline of Engineering and Management. Accepted entrance scores are CAT/ MAT/ CMAT for MBA, JEE Mains for B.Tech, and GATE for M.Tech.

College_Name: Prestige Institute of Management & Research, Bhopal, Madhya Pradesh
College_Summary: Prestige Institute of Management & Research (PIMR) was established in the year 2008 with the mission to provide exceptional professional education and training to students. Prestige Group has expertise in running colleges in Indore, Gwalior, Dewas and now in Bhopal. The Prestige Institute of Management & Research, Bhopal is approved by AICTE. The Institute is affiliated with Rajiv Gandhi Proudyogiki Vishwavidyalaya for technical courses and with Barkatullah University for non-technical courses. The institute offers B.Tech, M.Tech, MBA, B.Ed., B.Sc., BBA, B.Com, B.Pharma and D.harma courses. The institution provides company based professional training for its students.

Bhabha University is a private university situated in Bhoapl, Madhya Pradesh and was established in 2018 by the Ayushmati Education and Social Society. This university is spread across 27 acres of land. The campus of Bhabha University comes with vaious amenities like auditorium and conference facility, smart classrooms, health centre and seminar hall.

Indore Institute of Science and Technology (IIST), is a prestigious institute established in the year 2003. It is affiliated to Rajiv Gandhi Proudyogiki Vishwavidyalaya, Bhopal & is recognized by DTE, Madhya Pradesh Govt. IIST Indore offers 10+ programs and 9 branches under the UG and PG programs that include BTech and ME courses. The institute offers a 4-year long BTech program across 8 disciplines at the undergraduate level. Admission to this course is primarily based on the JEE Mains score followed by DTE MP counselling. For the year 2023, the IIST Indore JEE Mains cutoff ranged from 450013 rank to 1105143 rank for the general category candidates. Along with this, the institute offers an MTech program at the PG level for a duration of 2 years. This course is offered under 3 different specialisations. IIST Indore accepts GATE scores for allowing admission to its ME program.

College_Name: SAM College of Engineering and Technology, Bhopal
College_Summary: SAM College of Engineering and Technology (SAMCET) was established in the year 2007. The institute is approved by the All India Council of Technical Education (AICTE) and Government of India, New Delhi. SAMCET is affiliated to Barkatullah University, Bhopal, Madhya Pradesh Board of Secondary Education, Bhopal and Makhanlal Chaturvedi Rashtriya Patrakarita Avam Sanchar Vishwavidhyalaya, Bhopal. The institute offers undergraduate and postgraduate courses in Management and Engineering.

College_Name: Sanghvi Institute of Management and Science
College_Summary: Sanghvi Institute of Management and Science, Indore was established in 2006. The institute is a Private College of Indore located in the state of India Madhya Pradesh. The institute is one of the prestigious institutes and is accredited from AICTE, DTE, and is associated with Devi Ahilya Vishwavidyalaya. The institute offers more than 28 courses in various branches such as IT, Engineering, Science, Management, Commerce and Banking. The institute grants specializations in different courses such as B.Tech, B.Com, B.Sc, B.B.A, BCA.

Central Institute of Plastics Engineering and Technology (CIPET), Bhopal is a private educational institution located near to Bharat Heavy Electricals Ltd in the ‘City of Lakes’ – Madhya Pradesh. It is a constituent institute of Central Institute of Plastics Engineering and Technology (CIPET) which is an autonomous institute under the department of chemicals and petrochemicals. The center has been affiliated to Rajiv Gandhi Proudyogiki Vishwavidyalaya (RGPV), Bhopal and has been approved by AICTE.

Courses_Details.Course Name: Post Graduate Diploma in Plastics Processing and Testing
Post Diploma in Plastics Mold Technology

College_Name: MITS, Gwalior (Madhav Institute of Technology and Science)
College_Summary: Madhav Institute of Technology and Science, or MITS Gwalior, is one of Madhya Pradesh's oldest and most famous engineering colleges, established in 1957. It is located in Gwalior City and has approximately 47 acres of land approved by the National Board of Accreditation. The institute is affiliated with R.G.P.V., Bhopal, but has had academic autonomy since 2002 to provide courses of its choosing. The National Assessment and Accreditation Council (NAAC) awarded the institute an A++ grade (CGPA of 3.53), and UGC, New Delhi granted it autonomy. The college offers more than 30 courses in the fields of engineering, architecture, planning, science, and management. In the NIRF 2023 Engineering category ranking, MITS Gwalior has been ranked among the top 250 engineering colleges. The top course at MITS Gwalior is B.Tech, aspirants can apply and appear for JEE Main Exam for B.Tech admissions.

Upper_Section_Details.Approval: DCI, AICTE, PCI, INC, UGC, AIU

College_Summary: People's University is one of India's leading professional and research-driven private universities as well as one of the biggest single-campus universities situated in Bhopal, Madhya Pradesh. It has 10 constituent institutes that offer 25 courses along the Science stream, 7 courses along with Commerce stream, and 6 courses along the Arts streams. Both UG as well as PG courses like MBBS/ MD, B.Sc/ M.Sc, BDS, BBA/ MBA, B-tech/ M-tech, B.Sc Nursing/ M.Sc Nursing, BPT/ MPT, LLM & Ph.D,. etc can be obtained. Admissions to these courses are based on merit as well as entrance exams like NEET-UG & PG.

College_Summary: Rewa Engineering College, situated in Rewa in the state of Madhya Pradesh. It was established in 1964 and awards 1 Undergraduate course across 4 streams. The eligibility for this course is 10 + 2 passed from a recognized board and the selection is done on the basis of the JEE Mains score of the candidate. Applicants may apply online through the official website for admission by uploading the required documents.

Samrat Ashok Technological Institute [S.A.T.I.], Vidisha, Madhya Pradesh, established in November 1960 with a donation from Gangajali Trust Fund. It is an autonomous institute, fully funded by the Government of Madhya Pradesh and managed by  Maharaja Jiwaji Rao Education Society. It is spread over an area of 85 acres surrounded by lush green natural surroundings. It has been accredited by the NAAC.

College_Name: Patel College of Science and Technology - [PCST], Bhopal
College_Summary: Patel College of Science and Technology, Bhopal in Madhya Pradesh was established in 2002. It is accredited by AICTE. Under the UG domain, it offers B.Tech & Diploma Programs; M.Tech, and MBA under the PG domain. Admission is done either on a merit basis or entrance exam. The institute holds a good placement record as every year 40+ reputed recruiters visit the campus for recruiting students. Some of the eminent recruiters who had visited the Institute are Jabong, Concierge Technology, Universal Hunt, Micromax, ICICI, TCS, and many more. Candidates can apply to this Institute online as well as offline.

College_Name: Malwa Institute of Science and Technology (MITS Indore)
College_Summary: Malwa Institute of Science and Technology (MIST Indore) is an engineering institute offering Undergraduate, Postgraduate, and Diploma courses in various specializations of engineering. The selection of students in these courses is made on the basis of marks obtained in the qualifying entrance examinations. The accepted exam scores at MIST Indore are JEE Main and GATE.

Courses_Details.Course Name: Bachelor of Commerce [B.Com] + Master of Commerce [M.Com]

College_Summary: The Technocrats institute of Technology (Excellence) is a part of one of the premier institutes in Central India i.e., Technocrats TIT Group. The college offers undergraduate and postgraduate courses in six disciplines each for Engineering and Management. And the admission into these courses is done via entrance exams i.e., JEE MAIN/ GATE after which the student is admitted on the basis of the counseling done by DTE. At the end of the course, the college offers 100% placement opportunities to its students among the prominent companies in the market like Facebook, Netflix, SAP, etc. The college was recently awarded as the “Best Institute of Engineering in Central India - 2019” by the HRD Ministry, Govt. of India.

College_Name: Truba College of Science and Technology - [TCST], Bhopal
College_Summary: Truba Institute of Science and Technology, Bhopal is a private co-educational engineering college. College offers 5 undergraduate engineering courses. College is affiliated to Rajiv Gandhi Technical University and is AICTE approved.

College_Name: Shivajirao Kadam Group of Colleges, Indore
College_Summary: Shivajirao Kadam Institute of Technology & Management (SKITM), Indore is under the aegis of the Transnational Knowledge Society, which was founded in 2009. SKITM is accredited with an A Grade by National Accreditation and Assessment Council (NAAC). SKITM is also an ISO 9001:2015 certified institution. It provides degree, integrated, and diploma-level courses in a varying range of courses disciplines from Engineering, Pharmacy, Management, and Professional Studies. At the UG level, it offers B.Tech, BBA, B.COM, and B.Pharma and at the PG level, it offers MBA and Integrated MBA (BBA+MBA) courses. Admission to B.Tech is based on valid scores in JEE Main whereas admission to MBA is based on valid scores in CMAT. For admission in Polytechnic valid scores in PPT are required.

Sarvepalli Radhakrishnan University Bhopal, is a private university, established by RKDF Group, recognized by MP Private Universities Regulatory Commission under section MP Act No: 17 of 2007 & covered U/S 2 (f) of UGC Act in 2015, located in the Bhopal city of Madhya Pradesh. The university offers various full time degree courses in Medical, Management, Engineering, Commerce and other UG & PG programs.

College_Name: Technocrats Institute of Technology - MBA - [TIT], Bhopal
College_Summary: Technocrats Institute of Technology – MBA is a leading private institute in Bhopal. It was established in 2003 and is part of the Technocrats Institute of Technology Group. Affiliated to the Barkatullah University, the institute offers full time and part-time MBA that is accredited by AICTE.

Renaissance University Indore, Madhya Pradesh, formerly known as Indore Indira Business School is one of the newest private universities in central India. The university has a total of 10 departments, 34-course streams and 60000+ graduates around the globe. The university offers courses as Bachelor’s, Master’s, Diploma, and certification programs. The admission process is available online as well as offline. Admission is done on the basis of marks scored in national levels entrance exams like CAT, MAT, ATMA, XAT, and MPMET.

College_Summary: The Indore Christian College has been a centre of learning and excellence since its very inception. Each student is cared for individually and groomed by the exceptionally trained staff. Ideals of leading a strictly disciplined and hardworking life are imbibed in students during their tenure in the college.

It is manage by Vanshpati Smriti Shikhsa Samiti and known for its high quality technical education, state of art laboratories, high profile faculties and for the environment conducive for extracting the potential of each student. The Training & Placement Cell is guided by a Faculty Advisory Committee and supported by Student Placement Committee.

College_Name: Bhopal Institute of Technology & Science - [BITS], Bhopal
College_Summary: Established in 2002, the Bhopal Institute of Technology & Science (BITS) is one of the premier engineering colleges in Madhya Pradesh. It is a self-financing college and is approved by AICTE and the Directorate of Technical Education (DTE), Madhya Pradesh.

Madhyanchal Professional University (MPU), Bhopal was established in 2018 under the aegis of Vanaspati Smriti Shiksha Samiti (VSSS), Bhopal. The Samiti has been promoting a group of 8 colleges at Bhopal and Indore under the banner of Patel Group of Institutions (PGOI). The University provides higher education leading up-to Ph.D. in the disciplines of Science, Education, Humanities, Commerce, Management, Engineering, Medical, Paramedical, Pharmacy, Nursing, Agriculture, Animal Sciences, Forestry, Law, Journalism, Mass Communication, Environment and many other branches.

Sushila Devi Bansal College was established in the year 2005. It is an AICTE approved institute. It is affiliated with RGPV, Bhopal. Sushila Devi Bansal College offers courses in B.Tech, ME/M. Tech, and MBA across various disciplines. Admission to the SDBC is done on the basis of JEE Main, GATE, CMAT scores. Additionally, the institute provides 100% placement assistance to its students. The salary package offered to B.Tech students is recorded at INR 12.4 LPA and the salary package offered to MBA students is recorded at INR 12 LPA. Some of the top recruiters of SDBC are Hexaware, Wipro, Infosys, TCS, Persistent, Paytm, SBICap Securities, Collebra, Jaro Education and many more.

Admission to JIT is done on the basis of the performance of the candidates in the state and national level entrance exam.

The institute comes under the aegis of the Bansal Group of Institutes. It offers undergraduate and postgraduate courses in the discipline of Engineering and Technology, Computer Application and Management. Admission to BIST Bhopal is done on the basis of CAT/JEE Main/GATE scores. The institute brings to the students an integrative learning model based on the industry needs of skilled professionals. Additionally, The placement cell of BIST has placed 9500+ students so far in 200+ various companies of different sectors in core technical engineering and other domains. Engineering College, Nowgong was established in 2012 by the Madhya Pradesh government. It is located at NH-75, behind Navodaya Vidyalaya, Naura Pahadi, Nowgong, District- Chhatarpur. It is among the 5 autonomous government engineering institutes in Madhya Pradesh. College got approval from All India Council for Technical education (AICTE) in the academic year 2012-13. It is among the top engineering colleges of the state.

Panache Academy is accredited with ‘A’ grade by CIAC as well as by the Knowledge Consortium of Gujarat (KCG). The academy evaluates its programs under the guidelines of UGC. The institute has a strength of more than 6347 students and 37 certified teachers. Panache Academy has won the National Education Excellence Award.

College_Name: Sri Aurobindo Institute of Technology - [SAIT], Indore
College_Summary: Sri Aurobindo Institute of Technology (SAIT), Indore is a premier Engineering Institute of Central India, established in 2009. Admission in SAIT Indore depends on the performance of the candidates in JEE Main/GATE/MP PPT scores.

Oriental College of Technology, popularly known as OCT, is a private institute established in the year 2002. It is a venture institute of Oriental Group of Institutes. All the courses offered by the institute are recognized by AICTE, New Delhi.

College_Name: St. Aloysius Institute of Technology - [SAIT], Jabalpur
College_Summary: Located at Jabalpur, Madhya Pradesh, Saint Aloysius Institute of Technology is an autonomous college affiliated to Rajiv Gandhi Prodyogiki Vishwavidyalaya, Jabalpur. It is owned and operated by a minority Catholic Christian community Diocese.

Laxmipati Group of Institutions, Bhopal is a private Institute established in the year 2007. The Institute has been affiliated to Rajiv Gandhi Proudyogiki Vishwavidyalaya (RGPV), Bhopal also has been approved by AICTE.

College_Summary: Scope College of Engineering, Bhopal was started by All India Society for Electronics & Computer Technology (AISECT) in 2005. AISECT founded in 1985 is now India’s leading IT training & Educational Services Network. The institute is approved by AICTE (New Delhi) & affiliated to Rajiv Gandhi Proudyogiki Vishwavidyalay (Bhopal). It is located on Bhopal – Hoshangabad National Highway (NH – 12), 8 km from Habibganj Railway Station.

College_Summary: Dr. C.V. Raman University Khandwa is the fifth university under the AISECT Group of Universities and is located in the Nimar region of Madhya Pradesh (Khandwa). The university has varying course durations ranges from one-month certificate courses to up to diploma, UG and PG Programs in diverse fields like Business Administration, Arts, Science, Agriculture, Mathematics and many more. Admission to the CVRU Khandwa is done on the basis of merit and the AISECT Joint Entrance Exam (AJEE) scores. CVRU Khandwa has an exceptional infrastructure, highly skilled faculties and experienced trainers with good industrial backgrounds to provide precise knowledge and skills to the students.

College_Name: Surabhi College of Engineering and Technology - [SCET], Bhopal
College_Summary: Surabhi college of engineering and technology is a well-known university in the district of Bhopal, Madhya Pradesh. Established in the year 2008, with the motto " To promote an academic ethos of meritocracy and to nurture bright and globally acceptable talent while creating knowledge infrastructure in the field of education".

Xavier Institute of Development Action and Studies (XIDAS) Jabalpur ( popularly known as XIM Jabalpur), envisions a management education which promotes a fuller human life. It offers PGDM degree in six different disciplines viz. Business Management, HR, Marketing, Finance and Rural Management.

Vidhyapeeth Institute of Science and Technology, Bhopal, Madhya Pradesh
College_Summary: Vidhyapeeth Institute of Science and Technology is a renowned private college in Bhopal. It was founded in 2009 under the aegis of Maa Saraswati Education Society and offers Undergraduate, Postgraduate, and Diploma programs in various disciplines of Engineering. The college is approved by the All India Council of Technical Education, and affiliated to Rajiv Gandhi Proudyogiki Vishwavidyalaya. Admission is granted to aspiring candidates depending on their marks in the previous year’s qualifying exam and scores of entrance exams like JEE Main, and GATE.
